alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 08 at 2:23PM CDT until August 08 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MDT /6 PM CDT/ THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... The Flood Watch continues for * Portions of Kansas and southwest Nebraska, including the following areas, in Kansas, Cheyenne, Decatur, Gove, Graham, Greeley, Logan, Norton, Rawlins, Sheridan, Sherman, Thomas, Wallace, and Wichita. In southwest Nebraska, Dundy, Hitchcock, and Red Willow. * From 5 PM MDT /6 PM CDT/ this afternoon through late tonight * WHEN...From this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
